column3: News;Kampong Cham: According to a police report
column7: a 29-year-old administrative police officer in Prey Chhlar commune of Cheung Prey district police shot himself in the police station with an AK-47------After a review by the criminal police technical expertise group
column8: technical experts confirmed that Son Chit Pisei had used the firearm on himself.------ Police handed the body to the family for the traditional ceremonies.------Warning
